name: Perfect Pong
tagline: A simple, lightweight version of the classic arcade game "Pong." Web based using vanilla HTML5 and Javascript.
body: # PerfectPong A simple, lightweight version of the classic arcade game "Pong." Web based using vanilla HTML5 and Javascript. Rendering via the HTML Canvas ensures compatability will all modern browsers. Directions: Perfect Pong is played by two players. The goal is to knock the ball past the opposing paddle. Doing so awards one point — the first player to 10 points is victorious. Controls: The paddle can only move up and down. Player 1 uses the ‘W’ and ’S’ keys. Player 2 uses the up and down arrows. ![Start Screen](http://i.imgur.com/kJzyV88.png "Start Screen") ![Gameplay](http://i.imgur.com/tC1Oskz.png "Gameplay")
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
